item.dc:creator: @nueb35 Nueb35
item.description:
@nueb35 wrote:

[quote=“cartridges, post:5, topic:210541”][quote author=io9 link=topic=277400.msg2261336#msg2261336 date=1212771356]

Only 3 more till getClientVersion() breaks ;\

Theoretically, it should only break on two occasions, RS #503 and RS #765, as those are the applet dimensions, and, iirc, the only other sipushes within the range of new client versions
[/quote]

Theoretically yes, but couldn’t you just look for duplicate occurrences of 503/765?[/quote]

good idea ill go implement that into my updater

Read full topic

item.dc:creator: @cartridges cartridges
item.description:
@cartridges wrote:

[quote=“io9, post:4, topic:210541”][quote author=Unhandled link=topic=277400.msg2261207#msg2261207 date=1212735393]
Only 3 more till getClientVersion() breaks ;
[/quote]

Theoretically, it should only break on two occasions, RS #503 and RS #765, as those are the applet dimensions, and, iirc, the only other sipushes within the range of new client versions :/[/quote]

Theoretically yes, but couldn’t you just look for duplicate occurrences of 503/765?
